Dockerfile.description: Dockerfile only copies ./app ./app but does NOT copy ./static ./static. This is the root cause of UI 404 errors in Docker. Static files (index.html = 45KB) exist locally but are not included in the container image.

app/main.py.description: FastAPI app mounts static files via app.mount('/static', StaticFiles(directory='static'), name='static'). The static/ directory is at project root level (same level as app/).

docker-compose.yml.description: Uses service names as hostnames (postgres, keycloak) not localhost. Health checks configured with condition: service_healthy. Backend depends on both postgres and keycloak being healthy.
